title: Miso Soup
ingredients: ⅓cup white (shiro) miso, or to taste
½package (7 ounces) soft tofu, sliced into 1-inch cubes
¼cup dried wakame (seaweed), soaked in cold water for 10 minutes and drained
directions: Bring the dashi to a simmer in a saucepan, then scoop one large ladleful of the warm broth into a bowl and add the miso. Use a whisk to thoroughly dissolve the miso, then stir the mixture back into the pan. Taste and adjust with more miso if needed using the same method.
Add the tofu and soaked wakame and bring the broth to a simmer again. Give the soup one more gentle stir, divide among bowls, and top with the scallions.
